Please note that only applications submitted via this portal will be considered.
About UNIS Hanoi:
UNIS Hanoi is an extraordinary school - It is uniquely one of only two United Nations international schools in the world. It is where the world comes together every day and our 1200 students from 65 nationalities are engaged in learning that leverages curiosity, critical thinking, independent research and rigorous expectations to nurture excellence, empathy, creativity and resilience. 
Our students are attending the best universities in the world and our global community of alumni is quite literally changing the future for a better world. 
Position summary:
You will be developing and maintaining a data warehouse along with its essential components such as data pipeline integration, ingestion/transport, workflow orchestration, storage, processing, encryption, monitoring, business intelligence and analytical dashboarding. You will also develop and maintain custom applications based on school needs. As a member of the Information Systems team in the technology office, you will be required to understand the school’s operational and academic needs and work closely with staff and faculty to document requirements, design, implement and support appropriate data analytics and custom built applications. You will be required to contribute to the school’s initiative of a data maturity framework including strategic planning, ensuring data quality, standardisation, integration and compliance with data governance, privacy and protection guidelines. You will also be required to support the school's efforts in integration of artificial intelligence in our systems and processes within the scope of your responsibilities.
Responsibilities:
The Data and Apps Engineer will be directly responsible for contact between data owners and is responsible for implementing, managing, organizing and administering the Data Warehousing (DW), Business Intelligence (BI), Data Analytics (DA), Data Dashboard (DB), Extract, Transform and Load (ETL) and Google Appsheet and App Scripts based customised application solutions. This position is also responsible for general planning, oversight and training for the data processing and storage systems as well as routine and non-routine system operations and maintenance functions of these systems. A list of non exhaustive responsibilities related to this position is as follows:
• Analysing problems and providing solutions through data automation involving writing, managing, maintaining and troubleshooting scripts and algorithms that automate data flows from one system to another
• Identifying potential and existing data issues and discussing with appropriate people/teams
• Ensure the quality and integrity of data from capturing to reporting
• Formulate techniques for quality data collection to ensure adequacy, accuracy and legitimacy of data
• Assist with reports and data extraction, analysis and interpretation when needed
• Actively engage with developers community across other schools and industry to improve applications and establish best practices
• Work with Information Systems Manager for all periodic as well as ad-hoc tasks and projects to support the needs of school systems that are linked to the School MIS
• Work with Information Systems Manager to provide solutions for data analysis, visualisation, dashboarding and custom application development
• Investigate and propose technological solutions that meet these business requirements, including data warehousing, automations, custom application development and integration of applications and systems
• Recommend new processes or improvements in existing processes and workflows related to data warehousing and automation according to industry’s best practices and identified needs of UNIS Hanoi
• Work closely with senior management, school administrators, faculty and staff to identify data owners, streamline processes and build a culture of data responsibility as well as best use practices to encourage the dynamic and creative use of the academic and operational data at UNIS Hanoi
• Maintain appropriate, robust and updated documentation and auditable data management processes, procedures, configurations and change management
• Maintain an awareness of the latest technological trends and developments in Educational Software and Data systems
• Participate in evaluating new software projects to determine impacts
• Analyse, evaluate, troubleshoot and communicate with the technology team on problems related to data engineering, automation tasks and custom developed applications
• Record all incidents and requests with relevant details in the IT helpdesk system
• Working diligently to meet the SLAs (Service Level Agreements) for all reported issues and requests.
• Corresponding and collaborating closely with other school wide technology teams e.g. Technology Leadership Team, Technology & Innovation Coaches and Technology Team) regarding data engineering, automation projects, custom application development and issues
• Performing other duties as and when assigned by the supervisor
Within 1 month you’ll be expected to:
• Have a clear understanding of UNIS Hanoi’s Mission, Vision and Values, schoolwide and technology strategic plan and the technology team’s shared values and goals
• Have established a strong, agile and collaborative thought partnership with the members of Information Systems team for effective communication based on a constructive feedback model
• Present a comprehensive ‘strengths and growth’ review to your supervisor along with a 3 and 6 months plan for projects and tasks under you purview that focuses on how you can utilise your experience and skills to meet the existing deadlines and provide strategic input for projects under planning
• Have an effective KPI report plan shared with your supervisor based on your goals and professional development needs
• Demonstrate and role model a deep understanding and ownership of high quality and ITSM (IT Service Management) aligned Change Management, Workflows and Documentation processes for an effective data automation, data engineering, warehousing and application development in a dynamic and demanding environment
Within 3 months you’ll be expected to:
• Demonstrate effective integration in the team and school by conducting and presenting results of a comprehensive 360 feedback survey
• Demonstrate an authentic and inclusive approach in your work style by having formed strong professional relationships across the technology and other teams of UNIS Hanoi
• Present a systems thinking and growth mindset approach through a performance review based on the goals set at the beginning of your appointment
• Have reviewed and analysed evolving business requirements of data warehousing, data engineering and custom apps development. Investigated and shared solid roadmap that meet school’s identified and verified requirements
• Exhibit strong project management skills by recommending new processes or improvements in existing processes related to data warehousing, data engineering and automation and custom application development, according to the education industry’s best practices and identified needs of UNIS Hanoi.
• Fully understand and display ownership of the areas relevant to your responsibilities
Within 6 months you’ll be expected to:
• Demonstrate effective delivery of projects and tasks assigned to you with implementation of Service Level Agreements (SLAs) on all areas of you responsibilities
• Have planned, communicated and sought agreement from your supervisor and started the implementation of an effective professional development plan for yourself
• Have gained a full understanding of UNIS Hanoi’s data maturity framework, data warehousing, data engineering, automations and custom application development with an understanding of their relationship with systems, operational and educational domains along with clearly defined objectives and desired outcomes
• Have a strong collaborative partnership with team and divisions leaders across the school, to ensure an effective partnership and feedback model to help with identifying and addressing gaps as well as opportunities for improvement in areas of your responsibility
• Have engaged on at least one professional development path to obtain skills in a domain that will directly impact the quality and ownership of projects and tasks under your purview
Within 12 months and beyond you’ll be expected to:
• Continue delivering impactful and well planned projects
• Align your annual performance review goals in your domain with school and team strategic plans
• Build reflection and feedback model in your work practice to inform your growth and development
• Stay up to date with current best practices and trends in data warehousing, engineering, automation, artificial intelligence integration and low-code platforms
• Continue to prove the efficacy of your skills and existence of a strong trust based relationship with your team through an annual 360 feedback survey
• Bring forth the core values of UNIS Hanoi demonstrated by your work ethics and relationships built with the school community

title: IT DBA Operations
location: Hà Nội, Hanoi, Vietnam
description:
Job Purpose
The IT DBA Operation (Senior) Expert is responsible for providing Database (DB) expert knowledge in the DB operation to ensure the stability and performance of the systems.
1. To prevent the incidents & problems from happening by:
• Proactively address weaknesses, risks and problems on the DBs then have remediation plan to mitigate it to improve quality of services.
• Periodically review and assess the weaknesses, risks of the DBs.
2. Manage & hands-on incidents/problems solving activities:
• Manage the troubleshooting and directly handle the incidents & problems relating to the DBs.
• Analyze and conclude the root cause of the incidents & problems, define & implement the solutions to recover the services quickly and prevent them from repeating.
3. Assess DB operation of operation team regarding to framework/checklist/runbooks & compliance to figure out need improvements:
• Periodically review and assess need improvements of operation framework/checklist/runbook documents.
• Operation compliance assessment of operation teams in real-life.
Key Accountabilities (1)
- Collaborate with the appropriate departments to deeply understand the DBs, as a basis for the efficient and stable operation of services.
- Define operation frameworks, standards, processes, checklists, and tools for the DBs and communicate them to DB operation functions to apply into daily operation.
- Analyze and propose improvements upon technology and standards across the organization.
- Participate in training courses to remain up-to-date and knowledgeable in terms of industry trends and emerging technologies for IT operation support.
- Provide advice, trainings, and supports to people in the DB operation function.
- Participate as a key member in the incident response team to directly drive incident/problem handling progress and also responsible for analyzing and concluding the root cause of the incidents and problems; define and implement the solutions to recover the services quickly and prevent them from repeating.
- Develop methodology and assessment plan to proactively address weaknesses, risks and problems on the DBs, then provide remediation plan to improve quality of services.
- Creatively and independently provide resolutions to technical problems in a productivity and quality of service manner.
- Assess and report out the compliance of the operation activities in real-life.
- Report periodically to the Director of Infrastructure Services Excellent Center.
Key Accountabilities (2)
- Identify risks and coordinate with relevant units to propose methods to measure and minimize risks in the DBs operations.
- Ensure that team members fulfill their commitments on service quality and comply with the Bank's regulations and policies.
requirements:
Qualifications
• A bachelor’s degree in computer science or a related field.
• Advanced certification such as Certified PostgreSQL DBA(CPSDBA) is preferred.
• OCP, OCM is an advantage.
• A minimum of 4 years' experience as a DBA.
• Proficiency in data manipulation languages, including Oracle Database, MS SQL, Hadoop, or PostgreSQL.
• Analytical mindset and good problem-solving skills.
• Excellent verbal and written communication skills.
• Highly organized and responsible.
• Capable of working under pressure.
• Up-to-date with trends and developments in database administration.
• Join a squad team and willing work shift

title: Chuyên Gia Quản Lý Sáng Kiến Công Nghệ
location: Hà Nội, Vietnam
description:
Để đảm bảo hồ sơ được tiếp nhận xử lý, ứng viên cần nộp hồ sơ ứng tuyển trên website tuyển dụng chính thức của Vietcombank tại địa chỉ: https://tuyendung.vietcombank.com.vn
Nhiệm vụ chính
:
1. Thiết lập khuôn khổ, quy trình và tiêu chuẩn quản lý sáng kiến chuyển đổi liên quan đến công nghệ dựa trên các phương pháp/thông lệ tiên tiến:
a) Nghiên cứu các xu thế công nghệ, kỹ thuật mới trên thế giới, đặc biệt các công nghệ ứng dụng trong công tác quản trị dự án.
b) Đề xuất áp dụng các phương pháp/thông lệ tiên tiến liên quan đến công nghệ, kỹ thuật trong việc xây dựng các khuôn khổ, quy trình và tiêu chuẩn quản lý sáng kiến chuyển đổi tại VCB.
2. Hỗ trợ chủ sở hữu sáng kiến thực hiện các sáng kiến chuyển đổi liên quan đến công nghệ và trực tiếp triển khai các sáng kiến chuyển đổi liên quan đến công nghệ trong phạm vi phụ trách:
a) Giám sát tập trung danh mục sáng kiến chuyển đổi liên quan đến công nghệ theo phân công.
b) Quản lý nguồn lực triển khai, đề xuất bổ sung nguồn lực/năng lực còn thiếu về công nghệ, kỹ thuật cho các sáng kiến trong quá trình triển khai.
c) Chủ động giải quyết các vướng mắc phát sinh trong quá trình triển khai sáng kiến.
d) Báo cáo Lãnh đạo Trung tâm đối với các vấn đề ngoài thẩm quyền và đề xuất các biện pháp phòng ngừa, giảm thiểu rủi ro về công nghệ.
e) Trực tiếp triển khai các sáng kiến chuyển đổi liên quan đến công nghệ, kỹ thuật… theo phân công của Lãnh đạo Trung tâm.
3. Thực hiện quản lý hiệu quả của các sáng kiến chuyển đổi liên quan đến công nghệ:
a) Đề xuất xây dựng các tiêu chí, chỉ số, hệ thống đo lường và các công cụ cần thiết đặc thù cho các sáng kiến liên quan đến công nghệ để đánh giá hiệu quả.
b) Giám sát tiến độ, kiểm soát chất lượng, đánh giá kết quả, ảnh hưởng và mức độ áp dụng thực tế của các sáng kiến liên quan đến công nghệ được phân công.
c) Rà soát, nhận diện sớm, dự báo các rủi ro có thể xảy ra và đề xuất các biện pháp ngăn ngừa, giảm thiểu rủi ro về công nghệ.
d) Cung cấp báo cáo định kỳ cho các bên liên quan.
e) Nghiên cứu, đề xuất công cụ, hệ thống quản lý dự án, quản lý báo cáo phù hợp với xu thế công nghệ và mức độ đáp ứng của VCB.
4. Làm việc/tư vấn cho các bên liên quan trong nội bộ VCB và đối tác bên ngoài trong quá trình triển khai các sáng kiến chuyển đổi liên quan đến công nghệ (tiếp):
a) Đầu mối kết nối, tư vấn, điều phối các bên có liên quan trong nội bộ VCB và đối tác bên ngoài (nhà cung cấp, tư vấn, …) khi gặp khó khăn, vướng mắc trong quá trình triển khai các sáng kiến chuyển đổi liên quan đến công nghệ.
b) Nghiên cứu, đề xuất lựa chọn, quản lý nhà cung cấp và các hợp đồng với bên thứ ba (đối với các sáng kiến chuyển đổi do Trung tâm triển khai trực tiếp).
c) Phối hợp với các đơn vị có liên quan trong việc xây dựng, đề xuất điều chỉnh (nếu cần thiết) và triển khai các quy trình, quy định và cơ chế quản lý nhà cung cấp.
5. Tổ chức triển khai nội dung liên quan đến công nghệ trong chiến lược đổi mới sáng tạo của VCB:
a) Nghiên cứu các xu thế công nghệ liên quan đến lĩnh vực đổi mới sáng tạo và đề xuất áp dụng đối với VCB.
b) Phối hợp với các đơn vị liên quan triển khai thử nghiệm các xu thế công nghệ mới, các giải pháp, sản phẩm, dịch vụ mới theo quy định của VCB và phê duyệt của Ban Lãnh đạo.
6. Tham gia các lớp đào tạo, tập huấn nghiệp vụ theo kế hoạch của Trung tâm và VCB.
7. Thực hiện các nhiệm vụ khác do Lãnh đạo Trung tâm giao.

:

• Có chứng chỉ quản lý công nghệ như ITIL, TOGAF hoặc chứng chỉ chuyên môn về các lĩnh vực công nghệ cụ thể.
• Ưu tiên: Thạc sĩ trở lên chuyên ngành chuyên ngành công nghệ thông tin, khoa học máy tính, kỹ thuật phần mềm hoặc chuyên ngành liên quan.
2. Kinh nghiệm:
• Tối thiểu 05 năm kinh nghiệm làm việc trong lĩnh vực tài chính, ngân hàng, fintech, tư vấn quản trị doanh nghiệp.
• Tối thiểu 03 năm kinh nghiệm ở vị trí quản lý các dự án/sáng kiến công nghệ (ưu tiên kinh nghiệm tại các tổ chức tài chính, ngân hàng, fintech).
• Có kinh nghiệm quản lý các dự án/chương trình liên quan đến chuyển đổi, cải tiến quy trình hoặc triển khai công nghệ tại các ngân hàng/tổ chức tài chính.
• Có kinh nghiệm tham gia, triển khai nhóm nghiên cứu đề tài/sáng kiến chuyển đổi.
• Có kinh nghiệm sử dụng các công cụ quản lý dự án (Jira, Microsoft Project, Asana), quản trị hiệu suất hoặc các công cụ phân tích (Power BI, Tableau).
3. Kiến thức:
• Am hiểu nguyên tắc, phương pháp nâng cao trong quản lý dự án/sáng kiến
• Am hiểu về công nghệ và kỹ thuật trong lĩnh vực dịch vụ tài chính ngân hàng và ứng dụng công nghệ trong đổi mới sáng tạo.
• Am hiểu xu hướng công nghệ của các FinTech, các ngân hàng tại Việt Nam và trên thế giới.
• Am hiểu về AI, Blockchain, Big Data,…
• Am hiểu về phương pháp Agile và cách thức làm việc theo phương pháp Agile trong hoạt động tài chính, ngân hàng, fintech.

description:

We are seeking 
an expert in Android Automotive development
 to lead the design, implementation, and optimization of In-Vehicle Infotainment (IVI) systems and Cockpit Domain Controllers. The ideal candidate will possess deep expertise in Android Automotive, AOSP (Android Open-Source Project), and integrating multimedia, navigation, connectivity, and vehicle control features in a real-time automotive environment. This role requires experience in driving the technical architecture, coding, and hands-on system integration to deliver innovative automotive solutions. A key part of your responsibilities will include leading the development of high-performance, low-latency Android Automotive systems and collaborating across multi-OS platforms, including QNX Hypervisor integration.

1. Android Automotive IVI Systems Development

- Oversee the integration of cockpit domain controllers and Android-based systems with automotive hardware like displays, instrument clusters, and sensors.
2. Real-Time Systems Optimization
- Implement real-time optimizations within Android Automotive, ensuring low-latency performance for critical functions such as navigation and media streaming.
- Optimize system resource management for Android applications to ensure efficient CPU, memory, and GPU utilization.
3. Hands-On Development & Debugging
- Develop low-level software components, including device drivers and firmware for Android Automotive systems.
- Lead debugging efforts using tools like GDB and JTAG, troubleshooting hardware-software integration issues and meeting real-time constraints.
4. Platform Architecture & Integration
- Design Android-centric system architecture, ensuring smooth integration with multi-OS environments like QNX and ADAS systems.
- Implement multi-OS solutions, ensuring Android Automotive integrates effectively with safety-critical systems.
5. Client Engagement & Business Development
- Present Android Automotive solutions to OEMs, Tier 1 suppliers, and stakeholders, providing expert guidance on system architecture.
- Lead technical aspects of project proposals and bidding processes, including system requirements and integration plans.
5. Leadership & Cross-Functional Collaboration
- Mentor junior engineers and foster collaboration across departments to ensure seamless integration of Android Automotive solutions with vehicle systems.
Safety, Security & Compliance
- Ensure Android Automotive systems comply with automotive safety standards (ISO 26262, AUTOSAR) and implement cybersecurity measures like secure boot and data encryption.

 Familiarity with automotive safety standards such as ISO 26262 and AUTOSAR, and hands-on experience in implementing security measures for Android Automotive systems.

title: Business Analyst (Salesforce & eCommerce Website)
location: 77 Hoang Van Thai Street, Tan Phu Ward, District 7, HCMC
description:
JOB PURPOSE
We are seeking a detail-oriented and proactive Business Analyst to join the LocknLock eCommerce team. This role will be responsible for managing and analyzing Change Requests (CRs) related to our Salesforce-based systems, while also monitoring and improving website performance through data analysis. The ideal candidate will serve as a key liaison between business stakeholders and the technical team to ensure business needs are met with practical, scalable solutions.
KEY RESPONSIBILITIES
1. Manage Salesforce System Change Requests
•	Collaborate with departments (Sales, Marketing, Customer Service, etc.) to gather business requirements.
•	Translate business needs into technical documentation (BRD, User Stories, Use Cases, etc.).
•	Work closely with the technical team to assess feasibility, prioritize tasks, and coordinate implementation.
•	Track progress of development, conduct UAT (User Acceptance Testing), and coordinate go-live sign-off.
•	Ensure system changes align with business goals and do not disrupt existing operations.
2. Analyze Data to Optimize Website Performance
•	Monitor and analyze key eCommerce KPIs: traffic, conversion rate, bounce rate, average session duration, form submissions, online revenue, etc.
•	Utilize tools such as GA4, Google Tag Manager, Data Studio, Hotjar, and BigQuery to extract actionable insights.
•	Identify friction points in user journeys and recommend improvements in UI/UX, checkout process, and website functionality.
•	Propose and run A/B tests to validate assumptions and improve performance.
•	Support cross-functional teams with reports and data-driven recommendations.
3. Documentation & Business Process Standardization
•	Maintain clear and up-to-date documentation of business flows, system functions, and user guides.
•	Standardize the process for collecting and evaluating new feature/change requests.
•	Ensure traceability and transparency throughout the change management process.
4. Operational & QA Support
•	Monitor system performance and coordinate with the IT team to resolve technical issues.
•	Participate in system testing (UAT, regression tests) and provide feedback from a business perspective.
•	Identify opportunities for innovation and propose new solutions to support LocknLock’s digital growth.
requirements:
Qualifications & Technical Skills:
•	At least 2 years of experience in a Business Analyst role, preferably with exposure to Salesforce or other CRM systems.
•	Solid understanding of SDLC (Agile/Scrum or Waterfall).
•	Strong skills in business analysis, process modeling (BPMN, flowcharts), and writing BRD/user stories.
•	Proficient in data analysis and familiar with tools such as GA4, Excel (advanced), SQL, and Google Data Studio.
•	Basic understanding of APIs, JSON, or query languages is a plus.
Soft Skills:
•	Excellent communication and stakeholder management skills.
•	Strong problem-solving skills and critical thinking.
•	Highly organized, with the ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously.
•	Detail-oriented, self-motivated, and proactive.
Education:
•	Bachelor’s degree in Information Systems, Business Administration, Computer Science, or related fields.
BENEFITS
•	Competitive salary based on experience and qualifications.
•	Opportunity to work on a strategic eCommerce transformation project with Salesforce integration.
•	Exposure to modern analytics tools and a data-driven environment.
•	Training & development programs for BA and data analytics competencies.
•	Career growth path toward Product Owner or Business Solution Architect.

description:
Company Overview:
Join a boutique Data, Analytics, and AI consulting firm with offices in Sydney and Hanoi. We specialise in delivering tailored, high-quality data solutions across sectors such as manufacturing, software, wholesale, and retail. Leveraging Azure’s suite of services, we help clients harness the power of data to drive strategic decision-making and business transformation.
Role Overview:
As a Data Engineer, you will collaborate closely with the client’s Data Lead to design, develop, and maintain data architectures that enhance their data platforms. You will focus on building robust data pipelines, ensuring data quality, and optimising data systems for analytics and reporting. This role is ideal for someone passionate about solving complex data challenges in a dynamic and collaborative environment.
Responsibilities:
•	Data Pipeline Development: Build, test, and maintain data pipelines for real-time and batched data integration, automating processes such as data collection, cleaning, and transformation.
•	Data Platform Management: Administer and maintain data platforms, ensuring smooth data flow, monitoring system performance, and managing user access and permissions.
•	Data Quality and Operations: Ensure data quality through validation, cleansing, and transformation, while implementing optimisation techniques like partitioning and indexing.
•	Project Support: Assist in executing data integration and migration projects, collaborating with teams on technical requirements and project documentation.
•	Analytics and Troubleshooting: Provide technical support for data models and queries, support user training, and optimise analytics performance.
•	Governance and Compliance: Implement data governance policies, ensuring adherence to privacy, security, and regulatory standards, while maintaining technical documentation.
requirements:
Qualification and Experience:
•	Bachelor’s degree in computer science, Information Technology, Software Engineering, or 5 years related experience and certifications.
•	5+ years of experience in data engineering or SQL development, with hands-on experience building data warehouses, data pipelines or managing data systems.
•	2+ years of experience with Microsoft Fabric, Azure Analytics products or Databricks.
•	Highly skilled in SQL and Python for data manipulation and transformation.
•	Implementation experience of data warehousing or data platform modelling techniques, including Kimball, star schema design, and Medallion architecture.
•	Experienced with DevOps principles and practices, including Fabric deployment and data CI/CD pipelines.
•	Knowledge of data governance and data security practises including familiarity of Purview or Unity Catalog.
•	Experience with ERP systems Dynamics 365, AX and Business Central is beneficial.
•	Experience with Power BI and DAX is beneficial.
•	Azure Data Engineer Associate certification is beneficial.
Personal Attributes and Skills:
•	Proficient English to effectively communicate with international clients.
•	Excellent communication skills, with the ability to explain technical solutions and challenges to non-technical users.
•	Self‐starter with the ability to organise yourself and delivery results.
•	Ability to work in a fast-paced dynamic environment and work on multiple tasks simultaneously with strong task management skills.
•	Ability to work effectively in a team and collaborate with clients and colleagues.
•	Strong analytical and problem-solving skills with the ability to ask for help when needed.
Digital Intellect Offers You:
•	Challenging Opportunities: Projects that push you beyond your comfort zone, promoting professional growth.
•	Skill Development & Certifications: Support to enhance your technical expertise and earn certifications.
•	Diverse Project Exposure: A variety of projects that expand your commercial and business acumen across multiple industries.
•	Career Growth: An environment designed for continuous learning and development, to become a master data engineer.
•	Mentorship & Guidance: Benefit from working closely with experienced data leaders who support your career journey.
Benefits:
•	Additional leave days offered.
•	Annual Tet Bonus.
•	Company-sponsored professional certification and training.
•	All work equipment supplied
Digital Intellect Culture
At our company, we operate like a high-performance sports team. We believe in fostering a results-driven, dynamic environment where every individual is expected to perform at their best, collaborate effectively, and push boundaries to achieve excellence. Just like an elite team, we celebrate individual strengths while working towards a common goal. Success is earned through merit, accountability, and continuous improvement, and we thrive on the challenge of delivering high value to our clients. If you're ready to be part of a driven, focused, and high-performing team, you'll find a home at Digital Intellect.

description:

Education
• Bachelor’s degree in engineering, computer science or information technology

1.	3+ years working experience in software development and application support.
2.	3+ years experience leading an engineering organization at a product company is preferred.
3.	Good understanding application Enterprise banking service and project management skills.
Language skill
Proficient in Mandarin and English

title: Senior Quality Engineer (Up To 30 Months Of Salary Annually)
location: Hà Nội, Vietnam
description:
ABOUT THE ROLE
Crossian is a high-growth technology-driven e-commerce business. Behind our success is our people. As a start-up formed in 2020, we have created a fast-paced and dynamic environment, enabling our people to reach $100 million of revenue in 2024, a cumulative average growth rate of over 1000% in the last 3 years. Our mission now is to harness the power of technology to develop a direct-to-consumer approach and enhance customer lifetime value. We are looking for a skilled Full Stack Quality Engineer to join our team and ensure the delivery of high-quality software products. This role combines expertise in manual and automated testing, technical acumen, and collaboration skills to maintain product excellence across the development lifecycle. As a full-stack QC Engineer, you will work closely with product managers, developers, and stakeholders to test and improve our systems, ensuring an exceptional user experience and alignment with business goals.
WHAT YOU WILL DO
Testing and Quality Assurance:
• Design, develop, and execute test plans and test cases to ensure comprehensive coverage of product requirements.
• Perform functional, integration, regression, and system testing for both frontend and backend systems.
• Create and maintain detailed reports on testing progress, defects, and outcomes.
• Review and refine test strategies to optimize quality and efficiency.
• Ensure cross-browser, cross-platform, and device compatibility for applications.
Automation Testing:
• Develop, implement, and maintain automated test scripts using tools like Cucumber, Serenity BDD, and Playwright.
• Conduct API testing using tools such as Postman and performance testing with JMeter.
• Collaborate with the DevOps team to integrate automated tests into CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins and Git.
• Leverage programming skills in Java or JavaScript to enhance testing frameworks.
Collaboration and Delivery:
• Collaborate with BAs, developers, and product managers to understand requirements, provide input, and ensure alignment.
• Act as a quality advocate, focusing on delivering features that meet user needs and maintain high standards.
• Evaluate product readiness and release timelines based on test results and team discussions.
Leadership and Influence:
• Share quality-focused practices and promote a quality-first mindset within the team.
• Mentor team members on testing techniques and workflows to enhance overall quality.
• Ensure workflows and processes are followed consistently and improve them when necessary.
Continuous Monitoring and Improvement:
• Monitor product performance and user feedback in production environments to identify improvement areas.
• Stay updated with industry trends, tools, and best practices to continually improve testing processes.
• Drive initiatives to improve product quality, user satisfaction, and team productivity.
WHAT YOU CAN EXPECT

Identify and address employee relations issues, working closely with department leaders and the HR team to resolve conflicts and promote a positive work environment
Facilitate change management processes within the assigned department(s), helping employees navigate organizational changes and supporting leaders in driving transformation
Analyze HR metrics and data to identify trends and areas for improvement within the assigned department(s)
Collaborate with the broader HR team to ensure consistency and alignment of HR initiatives across the organization
Participate in HR projects and initiatives as needed, contributing to the continuous improvement of HR processes and practices

 Demonstrated commitment to promoting financial inclusion, social impact, and a passion for transforming lives through innovation and technology
Adaptability and flexibility:
 Ability to navigate and thrive in a rapidly changing and high-growth environment, demonstrating resilience and resourcefulness
Cultural agility:
 Experience working with diverse teams and an understanding of the importance of cultural sensitivity in a global organization

 Eagerness to stay up-to-date on industry trends, best practices, and new developments in HR and the fintech landscape, and the ability to apply this knowledge to improve HR processes and initiatives

 High level of self-awareness, empathy, and the ability to build strong relationships with employees and leaders across the organization

 Understanding of the importance of mental, emotional, and physical well-being in the workplace and the ability to develop and implement initiatives that support a healthy work-life balance

description:
Job Purpose
The Senior Expert, IT Architecture will play a critical role in setting up and designing the IT infrastructure and application architecture for a newly established life insurance company. This role will focus on defining the enterprise IT architecture strategy, ensuring system scalability, seamless integration with Techcombank and third-party platforms, and supporting the digital transformation of insurance operations. The Senior Expert will work closely with business teams, IT vendors, and external partners to ensure a robust, secure, and future-proof technology foundation.
Key Responsibilities
Enterprise IT Architecture & System Design
- Define the IT architecture roadmap, ensuring alignment with business strategy, scalability, and regulatory requirements.
- Develop and implement architecture standards for core insurance systems, including new business, underwriting, claims, and policy administration.
- Ensure system design supports seamless integration with distribution platforms, bancassurance channels, and customer self-service applications.
Collaboration with Techcombank & Business Units
- Work closely with Techcombank’s IT and digital transformation teams to integrate insurance solutions with the bank’s ecosystem.
- Define API and data exchange requirements to ensure real-time integration between the bank and the insurance company.
- Collaborate with business units, including underwriting, claims, and policy administration, to ensure IT solutions align with operational needs.
Cloud & Infrastructure Strategy
- Design and oversee the implementation of cloud-based infrastructure and hybrid IT environments.
- Work with IT security teams to ensure infrastructure and application designs meet cybersecurity best practices and regulatory compliance.
- Optimize IT infrastructure for performance, availability, and disaster recovery capabilities.
Third-Party Technology & Vendor Management
- Engage with IT vendors, system integrators, and technology partners to develop scalable, high-performance IT solutions.
- Evaluate and select core insurance platforms, middleware, and emerging technologies that enhance digital capabilities.
- Define service-level agreements (SLAs) with third-party providers and ensure compliance with contractual obligations.
Digital Transformation & Automation
- Lead the adoption of microservices, API-driven architecture, and cloud-native applications for business agility.
- Implement AI, machine learning, and automation tools to enhance underwriting, claims processing, and policy servicing.
- Ensure IT architecture supports a seamless omnichannel experience for customers and distribution partners.
Governance, Compliance & IT Security
- Ensure IT architecture aligns with regulatory requirements, including data protection laws and cybersecurity regulations.
- Develop IT governance frameworks and best practices to maintain system reliability and compliance.
- Work with IT security teams to implement data encryption, identity access management, and secure integration protocols.
Performance Monitoring & Continuous Improvement
- Develop key performance indicators (KPIs) to monitor system performance, integration efficiency, and security posture.
- Analyze IT infrastructure usage data to optimize system configurations and improve efficiency.
- Continuously evaluate emerging technology trends and recommend enhancements to future-proof IT architecture.
requirements:
Education
- Bachelor's or Master’s degree in Information Technology, Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field.
Experience
- Minimum of 7-10 years of experience in IT architecture, system integration, and enterprise technology implementation in the life insurance or financial services industry.
- Proven experience designing and implementing IT architecture frameworks for insurance core systems, cloud environments, and digital platforms.
- Strong expertise in API management, microservices, and enterprise data integration.
- Experience working with IT vendors, system integrators, and cloud service providers.
- Familiarity with cybersecurity frameworks and IT governance best practices.
- Track record of working in a startup or new business setup environment, building IT capabilities from the ground up.
Skills & Competencies
- Enterprise Architecture & IT Strategy – Expertise in designing IT architectures that align with business goals and operational efficiency.
- Cloud & Infrastructure Management – Strong experience in implementing cloud-based and hybrid IT infrastructure solutions.
- Digital Transformation & Emerging Technologies – Knowledge of AI, machine learning, blockchain, and automation technologies in insurance IT.
- Stakeholder & Vendor Management – Strong skills in engaging with Techcombank, business teams, and IT vendors.
- Regulatory & Compliance Knowledge – Familiarity with data protection laws, cybersecurity regulations, and financial industry IT standards.
- Process Optimization & API Integration – Expertise in enterprise service bus (ESB), microservices, and system interoperability.
Personal Attributes
- Analytical & Detail-Oriented – Strong ability to assess IT architecture needs and develop efficient solutions.
- Proactive & Solution-Oriented – Capable of identifying business needs and developing IT strategies to address them.
- Customer-Focused – Ensures IT solutions enhance customer experience and operational efficiency.

title: Senior Data Engineer (Up to 55Mil VND)
location: Unit 3, Floor 11, Bitexco Financial Tower,  2 Hai Trieu Street, Ben Nghe, District 1, HCMC
description:
We are looking for a highly skilled and proactive Senior Data Engineer to lead the design, development, and optimization of our data infrastructure. This role is critical in building robust data pipelines, managing databases, enabling scalable data modeling, and ensuring high data quality and observability. You’ll work with stakeholders across engineering, analytics, and operations to unlock the full value of data across the organization.
Key Responsibilities
•	Design data schemas and models (e.g., star/snowflake schema) that support analytics and business intelligence (BI) tools.
•	Implement and manage on-premises or cloud-based data warehouses (e.g., Snowflake, Redshift, BigQuery) or data lakes (e.g., S3, Azure Data Lake).
•	Design, build, and manage ETL/ELT pipelines to move and transform data from source systems (e.g., databases, APIs, flat files) into data lakes or warehouses.
•	Implement validation checks, data lineage tracking, and ensure compliance with data privacy policies.
•	Administer and optimize on-premises and cloud-native databases (e.g., Redshift, BigQuery, PostgreSQL, Oracle); optimize performance and storage, manage indexing, partitioning, and handle large-scale batch and real-time data.
•	Work with platforms like Apache Spark, Kafka, Airflow, DBT, etc., to orchestrate and scale data workflows; stay up-to-date with industry trends and best practices in data engineering.
•	Automate tasks using Python, SQL, Bash, etc., and manage version control (e.g., Git).
•	Monitor data jobs, debug failures, tune performance (e.g., job scheduling, data partitioning).
•	Work closely with Data Analysts, and DevOps teams to ensure data accessibility, usability, and reliability.
requirements:
Qualifications
Required
•	Bachelor’s or Master’s in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field.
•	5+ years of experience in data engineering or similar.
•	Strong proficiency in SQL and deep understanding of various database systems (e.g., Oracle, PostgreSQL, MySQL, SQL Server, NoSQL databases).
•	Experience with workflow orchestration tools (e.g., Apache Airflow, Luigi, Prefect).
•	Expertise in at least one programming language commonly used in data engineering (e.g., Python, Scala, Java).
•	Hands-on experience with cloud platforms (AWS, GCP, or Azure) and services like S3, Glue, Redshift, BigQuery, or Data Factory.
•	Strong understanding of data warehousing, data lakes, and pipeline orchestration.
Preferred
•	Experience with streaming data pipelines (Kafka, Kinesis, Spark Streaming).
•	Familiarity with data lakehouse architecture and tools like Delta Lake or Iceberg.
•	Exposure to data observability platforms, e.g., Monte Carlo, Great Expectations.
•	Prior experience in fintech, e-commerce, or high-scale environments.
Benefits:
•	Attractive compensation, with bonus according to company’s policy.
•	15 days of annual leave plus 3 days of summer leave.
•	Fully paid social insurance & premium healthcare insurance for employees.
•	Annual performance-based salary review.
•	Engagement activities and additional benefits as per Vietnamese Labor Law.
Salary: up to 55mil VND

description:
ABOUT THE ROLE
Crossian is a high-growth technology-driven e-commerce business. Behind our success is our people. As a start-up formed in 2020, we have created a fast-paced and dynamic environment, enabling our people to reach a cumulative average growth rate of over 1000% in the last 3 years. Our mission now is to build direct-to-consumer brands and increase customer lifetime value.
As our Performance Marketing Specialist, you'll be in charge of developing and executing performance-driven advertising campaigns on Facebook. Your expertise will be instrumental in optimizing campaigns, maximizing return on ad spend, and driving customer acquisition and retention. We're seeking someone with a strong background in Facebook performance marketing and a proven track record of achieving significant growth and driving results.
WHAT WILL YOU DO
•	Develop and execute performance marketing strategies on Facebook platform to acquire customers and boost customer lifetime value.
•	Plan, set up, and optimize Facebook advertising campaigns effectively.
•	Dive deep into campaign data to identify key performance indicators (KPIs), track campaign success, and make data-driven decisions for optimization.
•	Collaborate closely with our creative, analytics, and product teams to ensure seamless campaign execution and cohesive messaging.
•	Keep your finger on the pulse of Facebook advertising trends, best practices, and changes in the ecosystem, so we can stay ahead of the curve.
•	Test and iterate ad creatives, audience segments, and campaign strategies to continuously improve performance and maximize return on investment.
•	Provide regular reports to stakeholders, sharing insights, highlighting successes, addressing challenges, and identifying optimization opportunities.
requirements:
WHAT ARE WE LOOKING FOR
•	A bachelor's degree in Finance, Marketing, Business, or a related field. Extra points if you graduated from top universities (local or global) and had a GPA that sparkled.
•	2-3 years of experience in performance marketing, with a focus on Facebook advertising.
•	Proven track record of driving significant growth and achieving outstanding results in performance marketing campaigns.
•	Strong analytical skills and ability to extract valuable insights from data to optimize campaigns and deliver business outcomes.
•	In-depth knowledge of Facebook Ads Manager, including campaign setup, audience targeting, bidding strategies, and optimization techniques.
•	Familiarity with performance marketing metrics such as ROAS, CPA, LTV, and conversion rates.
•	Experience in the e-commerce industry or with direct-to-consumer brands is a plus.
WHAT YOU CAN EXPECT
At Crossian, our people are the key to our success. We believe in creating an attractive total compensation package (TCP) that not only retains employees but allows them to excel in their profession. These include:
•	Attractive salary, bonus, fair and transparent scheme, income up to $7000/month (basic salary up to $ 1000 depending on capacity)
•	Flexible, non-binding working time and space according to office hours
•	Full salary during probation
•	12 days work-from-home & 12 days of paid annual leave
•	Global health insurance package for yourself
•	Guaranteed 13th month salary
•	Quarterly bonus & Year-end bonus as part of our profit sharing program
•	A Pantry & a Crossian Cafe stocked with goodies, ready to serve
•	 Lots of other company benefits including 5-star annual Summer Summit, budget for frequent team building activities and other monthly / quarterly / annual company events
•	General company T&D Program
•	Other benefits in accordance to Company's Policy and Vietnam Labor Laws
Please note that we appreciate all applicants for their interest; however, only those candidates selected for interviews will be contacted.

description:
Do you want to work with the latest cloud technologies in Netcompany's Operations department? If that is the case, then the Cloud DevOps Engineer role might be for you! In this role, you will collaborate with the industry's most talented colleagues and are guaranteed professional development.
As our new colleague in the Cloud infrastructure team, you will play a key role in agile projects for both large Danish and international customers. You have a unique opportunity to be part of a team responsible for multiple disciplines: Cloud Governance, Cloud Center of Excellence, and Cloud Consultancy.
We design and implement business-critical solutions on state-of-the-art infrastructure for customers, where you get hands-on experience with Azure. You will help build and operate our central architecture and solutions, impacting all our cloud solutions across all customers. You will ensure operations in the intersection of infrastructure, security, and the development of customer solutions. Additionally, you will have the opportunity to be lent out to other projects within the organization as a cloud consultant for both shorter and longer periods. All of which we convert to services that enhance and develop our central capability.
As a Cloud DevOps Engineer, your tasks will include:
• Monitoring, alerting, automation, and scaling of cloud solutions.
• Creating coherence between development, operations, and security in accordance with DevOps and Infrastructure as Code (IaC) principles.
• Infrastructure as Code (IaC) tasks, e.g., in Terraform.
• Automation and standardization of cloud infrastructure processes.
• Design and implementation of cloud governance solutions.
• Delivering internal methods/methodologies/principles into customer projects.
• Leading or contributing to technical initiatives in the internal cloud infrastructure through experience from customer projects.
requirements:

• Have a bachelor's, master's, or engineering degree in ICT/IT, computer science, software/computer engineering, infrastructure, or other relevant vocational education experience.
• Have experience with Azure from education or previous work.
• Have experience with coding/scripting (.NET, Java, Web, PowerShell) and/or DevOps (Terraform, CI/CD) from education or previous work.
• Have 1-2 years of experience with Cloud technologies.
• Strong English communication skill (both written and verbal).
• Possess an analytical mindset, are motivated, and know how to work in a structured manner.
It would be beneficial (but not a must) if you:
• Have work experience.
• Have experience with infrastructure and operations.
• Have experience with Kubernetes, containers, or Docker.

We are looking for a highly organized, proactive, and versatile Product Operations Specialist to join our growing team at B3Networks, based in either HCMC or Da Nang. This is a crucial role focused on increasing the leverage and efficiency of our Product Management team and streamlining internal product-related processes for B3Networks' communication platform and solutions. The primary focus of this role is handling escalated product issues requiring deep technical investigation, alongside assisting Product Managers and managing product knowledge. The ideal candidate has a strong background or aptitude for technical troubleshooting, excellent problem-solving skills, and a proactive, efficiency-driven mindset.
Key Responsibilities
1. Level 3 Technical Escalation Management (Primary Focus)
● Take full ownership of complex technical product issues related to B3Networks' platform and solutions, escalated from L1/L2 support tiers, requiring deep diagnostic investigation (potentially including log analysis, API tracing, and system behavior analysis).
● Methodically triage, investigate, and drive the resolution of these L3 escalations, working closely with Engineering to pinpoint root causes within our communication services and validate proposed fixes.
● Manage escalations effectively towards resolution, adhering to internal Service Level Agreements (SLAs) and ensuring timely communication of status, progress, and technical findings to all relevant stakeholders (Support tiers, Product, Engineering, Business Units).
● Document investigation findings, troubleshooting steps, root causes, and resolutions clearly and concisely in internal systems (e.g., Jira, Confluence) to build the knowledge base and support future analysis.
2. Process Improvement & Operational Excellence Mindset
● Continuously analyze escalation patterns, investigation outcomes, and operational workflows (e.g., escalation handling, diagnostic procedures, knowledge sharing, incident communication) to identify systemic issues, recurring problems, bottlenecks, or areas for improvement.Proactively propose and contribute to the implementation of refined processes, improved tooling, or enhanced documentation designed to increase the efficiency and effectiveness of the L3 support function and contribute to overall product stability.
● Champion a mindset of continuous improvement within the team and in interactions with other departments.
3. Operational Collaboration & Support (Supporting Focus)
● Serve as a key operational liaison between L1/L2 Support, Engineering, and Product Management specifically concerning complex technical issues, incident management, and operational trends derived from L3 investigations.
● Provide valuable operational insights, feedback, and data gleaned from handling L3 escalations to support Product Managers in understanding real-world product performance and identifying areas for potential product enhancements or refinement.
● Provide operational assistance to Product Managers as required (e.g., gathering specific data related to escalations, coordinating meetings focused on resolving operational issues, supporting release readiness from an operational perspective) to enhance product stability and improvement efforts.
● Where necessary, assist in coordinating cross-functional communication and actions during the resolution of major incidents impacting the platform or solutions.

- Grow your career in a leading technology corporation.

 in ASIC/SoC digital design or complex FPGA development.

- Solid understanding and practical experience with ASIC front-end flows (RTL design, Synthesis, FE Quality Checks).

- Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills with a passion for innovation.
- Strong communication and teamwork skills, with the ability to collaborate effectively across multi-disciplinary teams.

- Understanding of Static Timing Analysis (STA) concepts and backend-related flows.

description:
Join our 
Technology Innovations Center of Excellence (CoE)
 at 
Crossian
, a 
fast-growing startup that achieved a milestone of $100M in 2024
. In this dynamic role, you'll check in daily with your team to stay aligned on project goals and collaborate across our ecosystem with an 
Agile mindset
 infused with a 
unicorn-worthy startup culture
.
We are building an E-commerce 
Data Platform
 following 
Lakehouse Architecture
, leveraging 
Airflow, Airbyte, dbt, and Redshift on AWS Cloud
. Our system is currently in the early development stage, providing a unique opportunity for you to be involved from the ground up—
shaping the architecture, defining data pipelines, and implementing best practices
. Here are some examples: Storefront, Payment Gateway, Inventory, Catalog, Logistics, Marketing Insights, CRM.
Why join us?
We’re not just about building platforms; we’re about creating a workplace where talent thrives. Here's what you’ll gain:
Exceptional Compensation
•	 Up to 30 months of salary per year
 through competitive salary packages and performance-based bonuses.
•	Total annual compensation $30,000, reflecting your expertise and contribution.
Growth Opportunities
•	Hands-on exposure to cutting-edge technologies and complex system architecture in a global-scale project.
•	Clear career advancement pathways and access to continuous professional development programs.
Global Vision
•	Contribute to projects that redefine how brands connect with consumers globally.
•	Opportunity to work on challenging problems in data analytics, customer engagement, and operational efficiency.
In addition to development tasks, you’ll collaborate closely with other CoEs to understand their unique challenges. With your technical expertise, you’ll continuously propose innovative solutions to elevate their performance and contribute to the overall success of the organization.
Responsibilities
1.	Collaborate with Data Analysts and Business Teams
 to understand data needs and provide timely solutions for reporting and insights.
2.	Work on data integration
 from various sources, including APIs, web services, and databases.
3.	Utilize tools
 such as AWS QuickSight, Grafana, and Google Sheets for data visualization to support business decision-making.
4.	Support developing and maintaining 
scalable
 data pipelines 
and 
ETL/ELT 
processes to collect, clean, and process
 large-scale datasets
 in data systems.
5.	Monitor data pipeline performance
 and troubleshoot issues to ensure data integrity and availability.
6.	Document technical processes
, contribute to data catalogs, and ensure compliance with data governance policies.
7.	Engage in continuous learning and improvement, staying updated with industry best practices in Data Engineering.
requirements:
Requirements & Skills
1.	Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Systems Management or related fields.
2.	2+ years of experience in data engineering, ETL development, or a similar role.
3.	Proficiency in using advanced SQL queries to extract valuable insights from datasets.
4.	Experience in one of the following programming languages: Python or C# for data processing and scripting.
5.	Experience with relational databases, such as PostgreSQL, MySQL, Oracle, or MS SQL Server.
6.	Understanding of cloud computing platforms (e.g., AWS, GCP, Azure).
7.	Excellent problem-solving skills, attention to detail, and the ability to work independently or as part of a team.
8.	Strong communication and collaboration skills, particularly in an Agile environment.
9.	Proficient in English, with the ability to communicate, read, and write effectively in a professional work environment.
Preferred (but not required)
1.	Experience working with BI tools such as AWS QuickSight, Grafana, or Google Sheets.
2.	Familiarity with data orchestration tools like Airflow or dbt.
3.	Exposure to cloud-based storage solutions and data lake architecture.
4.	Familiarity with the Agile toolset, such as GitLab, Jira, Confluence, and Slack.

description:
General Summary
- As a leading technology innovator in Vietnam, FPT is expending and entering new area such as the IC Design market. FPT is looking for bright ASIC engineers with excellent analytical and technical skills. Besides ASIC and/or FPGA design experience, this professional needs to be a great team player with good communication skill. This is a great opportunity to join a fast-paced SoC team responsible for RTL Design, flows and methodology for high performance ASICs which enable AI acceleration in our smart camera design with more efficient TOPs/Watt.
- FPT Telecom is hiring ASIC Design Verification Engineer within the Infrastructure organization. We are looking for individuals with experience in Design/Verification to build IP and System On Chip (SoC) for Edge AI applications.
Our offer
- Development of SoA AI hardware accelerators that redefine efficiency and performance.
- Collaboration with a team of high-level engineers and researchers.
- Work on transformative projects that impact industries worldwide.
Job Description
- The majority of compute effort for Deep Learning inference is based on mathematical operations that can mostly be grouped into four parts: convolutions, activations, pooling, and normalization. These operations share a few characteristics that make them particularly well suited for special-purpose hardware implementation: their memory access patterns are extremely predictable, and they are readily parallelized.
- Many proposed DLA architect exist in the academic literature and also industry such as the NVDLA architecture proposed by NVIDIA Deep Learning Accelerator (DLA) project which promotes a standardized, open architecture to address the computational demands of inference. Or more recently Xilinx proposed AI Engine architecture on its Versal Edge AI series. ARM corporate with NVIDIA in its Trillium project which bring Deep Learning to billions of IoT chip with the Ethos NPU IP.
As an AI Hardware Accelerator Engineer, you'll:
- Design and optimize hardware accelerators tailored for machine learning and AI workloads.
Implement cutting-edge architectures for high-speed inference computation and low power consumption.
- Collaborate on system-level integration to ensure seamless functionality.
requirements:
• A degree in electrical engineering, computer engineering, or a related field.
• Knowledge of System-On-Chip or ASIC design, and understanding of SoC or ASIC tools/flows.
• Design/Verification skills, System Verilog, UVM.
• RTL Synthesis Coding Solid experience in designing hardware accelerators, including FPGA/ ASIC development.
• Proficiency in hardware description languages (e.g., VHDL, Verilog) and EDA tools.
• Understanding of system level architecture, such as interconnects, memory hierarchy, interrupts, and memory-mapped IO.
• In-depth knowledge of ML/DL Technologies.
• Problem-solving skills and a passion for innovation.

- Quản lý và điều phối toàn bộ hoạt động chăm sóc khách hàng trước, trong và sau bán hàng nhằm đảm bảo trải nghiệm tích cực cho khách hàng, nâng cao mức độ hài lòng; đồng thời tối ưu hiệu quả vận hành của các Bộ phận: Tổng đài, Bảo hành và Quản lý thuê bao…

- Quản lý các nhóm chức năng:
• Bộ phận Tổng đài:
 Xây dựng và áp dụng quy trình, tiêu chuẩn dịch vụ cho tổng đài chăm sóc khách hàng.
 Theo dõi, đánh giá hiệu suất làm việc của nhân viên nội bộ hoặc đối tác vận hành tổng đài.

• Bộ phận Bảo hành:
 Thiết lập quy trình tiếp nhận, xử lý và theo dõi yêu cầu bảo hành sản phẩm/dịch vụ.

• Bộ phận Quản lý thuê bao:
 Quản lý cơ sở dữ liệu khách hàng, thông tin thuê bao, và các nghiệp vụ liên quan đến dịch vụ thuê bao: kích hoạt, hủy, thay đổi gói cước,…

 Phối hợp với các bộ phận liên quan xử lý kịp thời các vấn đề phát sinh trong quá trình khách hàng sử dụng dịch vụ.
 Tổ chức các chương trình chăm sóc thuê bao định kỳ như chăm sóc sau bán hàng, khảo sát mức độ hài lòng, tặng quà...
- Thực hiện các nhiệm vụ khác theo chỉ đạo của Ban Lãnh đạo, phù hợp với chức năng và trách nhiệm của Trung tâm Dịch vụ Khách hàng.

Do nhu cầu mở rộng kinh doanh, phát triển các dịch vụ viễn thông di động kết hợp với nhà mạng viễn thông cho khách hàng doanh nghiệp, công ty cần tìm Trưởng phòng kinh doanh có kinh nghiệm và độc lập để phát triển và mở rộng thị trường dịch vụ SIP Trunk. Vị trí này yêu cầu sự tự chủ cao trong việc triển khai kinh doanh, với trách nhiệm toàn diện từ xây dựng chiến lược đến thực thi kế hoạch kinh doanh.
Các nhiệm vụ bao gồm:
- Phụ trách xây dựng duy trì và phát triển khách hàng doanh nghiệp cho nhóm sản phẩm dịch vụ viễn thông: Mobile Sip Trunking, Mobile Voice Brandname.
- Thu thập, tìm kiếm thông tin của các khách hàng tiềm năng, khai thác thị trường và phát triển khách hàng mới.

- Xây dựng và triển khai chiến lược kinh doanh cho các dịch vụ trên .
- Phân tích thị trường, đối thủ cạnh tranh và hành vi khách hàng.
- Thực hiện các công việc khác theo yêu cầu của Giám Đốc.   
Yêu cầu:
- 3-5 năm kinh nghiệm trong kinh doanh B2B lĩnh vực viễn thông, ưu tiên có kinh nghiệm bán SIP Trunk, Voice Brandname, tổng đài Contact Center, CRM.
